Articles.Content:
This is the game where you think of a Kerbal job and the next poster rate it from 1 to 10. 

Examples : 

User 1: (The job)

(Explains the job)

User 2: 

(Rate it)

(the job)

(Explain it)

I'll go first: 

The Nuclear Bomb Detonator 

Because Kerbin lacks remote fuzes, some brave Kerbals will drop with the bomb to detonate it.

3/10, why not light it in the bomb bay then drop it?

Human Space Program Forum Moderator

Because Jeb can't be trusted to be polite online.

10/10 I think I have to @ every single moderators in this forum… Anyway, that's a good reference. 

Strut miner

Struts in Kerbin wasn't made in factories. They are minerals that generates below KSC. How to mine these hardest stuffs? Of course, mine struts by struts!

7/10 cool but an automated mine would be cooler.

Name thinker

Thinks for names of new parts

10/10 I bet Just Jim would tell you how great of a job it is.

Koviet Kunion

Acts as a way to push a space program along.

10/10 that's cool. 

Space ship captain

Because of a pun.
